biotools.summary: A search engine which provides an exploration of plant genomic data for forward genetic research and comprises millions of quarterly updated and indexed information from major life science databases as well as millions of evidence ranked gene annotations to associate these facts to plant genome loci.

bioschemas.name: LAILAPS Search Engine (transPLANT instance)
bioschemas.summary: A search engine which provides an exploration of plant genomic data for forward genetic research and comprises millions of quarterly updated and indexed information from major life science databases as well as millions of evidence ranked gene annotations to associate these facts to plant genome loci.
